title: Career as a chartered accountant
creator_credit: Tony Wellington, Garry Blackledge and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: This film provides an indication of the qualifications necessary to become a chartered accountant and then looks at the various avenues open after completion of studies. Suitable for secondary school level.
